name: Riretrim
description:
Hi! Riretrim is a Galaga-Like Game made using Unity!
It's my 2nd game project and my first project in Unity.

Discord: https://discord.gg/jhK6Ab3

Save-Games located in: C:\Users\USER\AppData\LocalLow\Fuchsia\Riretrim

Our current Team:
- Developers: Jayson.json

- Artists: Asc4Yin, Simopard, KartoffelJeff.

It's been in Development for about 2-3 Months now, but i'm working daily on new stuff!

Another feature is the Space Map, where the color, planets and other stuff is randomly generated!

Space Map

Galaxy with diffrent generated Stars

Galaga-Style Gameplay! (Very WIP)
